product_name: Nite Ize Clippable Gear Tie - 2 Pack
long_description: With a sturdy plastic S-biner on one end and a tough, flexible Gear Tie on the other, you can attach the Nite Ize Clippable Gear Tie to a zipper pull to zip jackets, luggage, backpacks, and bags. Bend the Gear Tie to organize cords, carry headsets, hang keys, or other small items you want to keep conveniently accessible. Clippable Twist Tie can also be attached to keyrings, belt loops, or other anchor points to carry small personal items as a keeper. Attach it nearly anywhere to keep smaller items of all kinds right where you need them. Tough thermoplastic elastomer shell provides excellent grip virtually anywhere yet won't scratch or mark. Strong internal wire holds its shape; it's quick and easy to securely attach and detach. UV resistant design will not be damaged by extended sun exposure. Pack of 2.
short_description: With a sturdy plastic S-biner on one end and a tough, flexible Gear Tie on the other, you can attach the Nite Ize Clippable Gear Tie to a zipper pull to zip jackets, luggage, backpacks, and bags.
